channel.title: Google Earth easter egg
channel.description: you may have heard of this you may have not either way here it is first get google earth [url=http://earth.google.com/download-earth.html]http://earth.google.com/download-earth.html[/url] you need that specific one i think anyways open it up click once on the earth and then press Ctrl+A or Ctrl+Alt+A and you open up the google earth flight simulator where you can choose between two planes and an airport to take off from. Basic controls: Up arrow: the plane dives Down arrow: pulls the plane upwards Left arrow: roll left Right arrow: roll right Page up: increase throttle Page down: decrease throttle

item.title: Google Earth easter egg
item.dc:creator: @sanga282 sanga282
item.description:
@sanga282 wrote:

you may have heard of this you may have not either way here it is first get google earth
http://earth.google.com/download-earth.html
you need that specific one i think anyways open it up click once on the earth and then press Ctrl+A or Ctrl+Alt+A and you open up the google earth flight simulator where you can choose between two planes and an airport to take off from.
Basic controls:
Up arrow: the plane dives
Down arrow: pulls the plane upwards
Left arrow: roll left
Right arrow: roll right
Page up: increase throttle
Page down: decrease throttle

Read full topic
